SLACK_TOKEN.description: Additional security step: Slack slash command token for verification that the request came from your Slack team (not required)

USERNAME.description: Username to use when replying with the conversion result (default: dorrars)

EMOJI.description: Emoji icon to use when replying with the conversion result (default: :moneybag:)

DEFAULT_CURRENCY.description: Default currency to convert to if no second currency is specified (default: DKK)
